1111100001011001 0001011111100011 1 -> sum: 0001000000111101, cout: 1
0011000111000010 1000101010111100 1 -> sum: 1011110001111111, cout: 0
0110011011010001 1111111010000110 1 -> sum: 0110010101011000, cout: 1

1011010100101001 1000011000000101 1 -> sum: 0011101100101111, cout: 1
0011000001100111 0000110001010111 1 -> sum: 0011110010111111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
